name: The Bean
description:
The Bean is an indie First-Person Shooter game/FPS game(lowpoly and offline/singleplayer),created by one person with UnityEngine.

In this game you are a bean that you have to survive as many waves as possible ... it's simple

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

System requirements [Minimum] CPU: 2 cores 2 threads, 2.0 Ghz  Intel Pentium G2020 \ AMD A6-7310 APU GPU: 500MB VRAM,  DirectX 11 GeForce GT 430 \ Intel HD 5500 \ Radeon R5 M330 4GB RAM DDR3 [Recommended] CPU: 4 cores 4 threads, 3.5 Ghz  Intel i5-3450 \ AMD FX-6330 GPU: 1GB VRAM,  DirectX 11 Radeon Vega 8 \ GeForce GTX 550 Ti \ Intel UHD 630 \ Radeon R9 M375 8GB RAM DDR3
